floralTeaMenu.name: Chamomile Tea
floralTeaMenu.description: A soothing herbal tea made from dried chamomile flowers.

floralTeaMenu.name: Jasmine Tea
floralTeaMenu.description: A fragrant tea made by blending green tea leaves with jasmine blossoms.

floralTeaMenu.name: Rose Tea
floralTeaMenu.description: A delicate tea made from dried rose petals.

floralTeaMenu.name: Osmanthus Tea
floralTeaMenu.description: A fragrant tea made from osmanthus flowers, often blended with green or black tea.

steepedBrewMenu.name: Yerba Mate
steepedBrewMenu.description: A traditional South American tea made from the leaves of the yerba mate plant.

steepedBrewMenu.name: Black Tea
steepedBrewMenu.description: A robust and full-bodied tea made from fully oxidized tea leaves.

steepedBrewMenu.name: Oolong Tea
steepedBrewMenu.description: A traditional Chinese tea made from partially oxidized tea leaves.

steepedBrewMenu.name: Matcha Green Tea
steepedBrewMenu.description: A finely ground green tea powder from Japan, traditionally whisked into hot water.

sweetTreatMenu.description: A rich and fudgy chocolate brownie topped with walnuts.

sweetTreatMenu.name: New York Cheesecake
sweetTreatMenu.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, topped with fresh berries.

sweetTreatMenu.name: Vanilla Cupcake
sweetTreatMenu.description: Classic vanilla cupcake with buttercream frosting and sprinkles.

sweetTreatMenu.name: Strawberry Shortcake
sweetTreatMenu.description: Layers of sponge cake, fresh strawberries, and whipped cream.

sweetTreatMenu.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
sweetTreatMenu.description: Homemade cookies packed with chocolate chips, served warm.

sweetTreatMenu.name: Red Velvet Cake
sweetTreatMenu.description: Moist red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting.
